body.p: As a data scientist, your goal is to build a balanced model, you want low bias and low variance. Which of the following errors can be minimized to increase accuracy and lower bias and variance simultaneously:

feedback.p: Incorrect; This error results from uncertainty outside of bias and variance.
Correct; Reducible errors can be controlled by selecting models and training sets that will minimize the errors associated with the models.
Incorrect: These errors are related to defining the business and analytic objectives.
